data.fullContent: Mike was caught cheating on the exam on Tuesday, and he feels terrible. He had a cell phone up his sleeve, and used it to find out the answers. Now that he has been caught, he regrets cheating and feels a deep shame. He swears he will be honest in the future.
data.answer: 迈克在周二的考试中作弊被抓住了，他感觉很糟糕。他有一个手机在他的袖子里，用它来找出答案。现在他被抓住了，他后悔作弊，并感到非常羞愧。他发誓将来会诚实。
